detail_desc: Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck opening with narrow ties at the top and frills. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.

Short dress in chiffon with glittery metal thread embroidery and beaded appliqués. V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam and detachable, twisted ties at the waist. Scalloped edges at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline with narrow elastication at the back, covered buttons down the front and short sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short dress in soft, stretch corduroy with shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, zip at one side and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist.
Short dress in soft, stretch corduroy with shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, zip at one side and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap, concealed magnetic fastener, narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 5.5x16.5x22 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap, concealed magnetic fastener, narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 5.5x16.5x22 cm.
Double-breasted jacket in jersey made from a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Peak lapels, a gently tapered waist, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, flared, pleated skirt in a checked weave made from a viscose blend with a concealed zip and metal press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short, flared, pleated skirt in a checked weave made from a viscose blend with a concealed zip and metal press-stud at one side. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Long sleeves with a gently gathered seam at the top and elasticated smocking with ties and a frill trim at the cuffs.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Long sleeves with a gently gathered seam at the top and elasticated smocking with ties and a frill trim at the cuffs.

Jumpsuit in airy, softly draping jersey containing glittery threads with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill-trimmed wrapover front. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elastication at the waist and wide, straight-cut legs. Unlined.
Swimming trunks in jersey with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a lined front.
Swimming trunks in jersey with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a lined front.
Fisherman’s hat in patterned cotton twill. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered appliqué on one side and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with matching accessories.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with matching accessories.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with matching accessories.

Bodysuit and a pair of leggings in organic cotton. Long-sleeved jersey bodysuit with a narrow frill trim around the neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Ribbed, fine-knit leggings with an elasticated waist and frill at the back.
Fitted top in stretch, glossy jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Fitted top in stretch, glossy jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Fitted top in stretch, glossy jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a square neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Dressing gown in cotton terry with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a hood with embroidery and appliqués.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with crossover straps and a decorative knot at the back. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
